# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/noise_data.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/noise_data.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/noise_data.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/noise_data.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/noise_data.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/noise_data-gold-stdout ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/noise_data-gold-stdout ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/noise_data_noTNI.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/noise_data_noTNI.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/noise_data_noTNI.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/noise_data_noTNI.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/noise_data_noTNI.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1042_SON/noise_data_noTNI.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} noise_data_noTNI.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} noise_data_noTNI.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1042_SON/noise_data_noTNI.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1042_SON/noise_data_noTNI.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;noise")
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1042_SON/noise_data.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} noise_data.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} noise_data.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1042_SON/noise_data.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1042_SON/noise_data.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;noise")
